attributes.action: Close All US Military Bases in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK should not be apart of the US military machine and directly part of US foreign policy for the 21st century. Presently the US is the only foreign power that has a substantial military presence on UK soil and this is not an act promoting or aiding the UK in retaining it's own independant soverign powers. All US bases should be closed imediately.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Close All US Military Bases in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14140.asp

Prime Minister's Office
